overview: A man is delighted to hear that his wife is pregnant and he begins to prepare for the wonders of fatherhood.  As time progresses along, the family grows larger with each successive child and the father feels his importance in the family has been lessened with all the children.  This man's quiet desperation to hold onto his position is an interesting lesson in the family dynamic and how everyone is an important part of the whole.
title: The Head of the Family
